events.summary: Fulminations in the Frost Major Update
events.description: Introduction of two new weapon types (Dual Blades and Lances), four new large monsters (Radobaan, Banbaro, Barioth, and Zinogre), a new sleep element for weapons, rebalancing of existing weapon types and monsters, and a snowy field change for winter habitats.
Launch of Hunt-a-thons, a new hunting experience where some gathering points turn into Hunt-a-thon Points, allowing hunters to hunt five large monsters in succession.
During this event, Zinogre's appearance rates in Hunt-a-thons will be boosted, and hunters can complete exclusive Event Quests to receive a new Hunter Medal.
